EmailTemplate.description: User announcements update for sprint 26 A release
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 26A
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Update to Lead/Journey importer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains changes to the Lead/Journey importer
To review our release video, select the link below. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1v5Q9joiTNHD_QOY4eZ_vd-klugeFzjzD/view?usp=sharing
Lead/Journey importer - Changes
Campaigns You can now add campaign members to salesforce through the lead/ journey importer.
Simply check the box for "Select Campaign for Leads" if you want to add leads as campaign members. A search box to select a campaign to appear. Search for your campaign, then select upload
Enhanced email notification
We have updated your summary email for your upload. It now features a clearer summary table and a list of all the records created in Salesforce.
Notes
If you are uploading non latin characters, make sure to upload a UTF-8 CSV. We are decommissioning the standard import wizard Friday, January 26, 2018, all users will be required to use the lead/journey wizard. If you are uploading list for the newsletter, please contact your regional marketing manager.
If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to salesforcesupport@wework.com
Warmly, Susie
